replies.body:
Hiya qwentin2013! 

As mentioned on the [Champion Update Schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule), Poppy will ve receiving a visual and gameplay update! You can find out a bit more about the update via the [dev blog](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/dev-blog-champion-updates)!

Please don't make Poppy super cute like other yordles... I like her being a bit more on the serious side. It's a nice change of pace for yordles.

(And if she could get some mana reductions in the interim before her kit overhaul... that'd be awesome too. The early game with those mana costs is too painful for me to use, despite having a fun kit.)

> [{quoted}](name=Lady Luck,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fwnUUQMP,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-03-10T22:00:08.571+0000)
>
> Please don't make Poppy super cute like other yordles... I like her being a bit more on the serious side. It's a nice change of pace for yordles.
> 
> (And if she could get some mana reductions in the interim before her kit overhaul... that'd be awesome too. The early game with those mana costs is too painful for me to use, despite having a fun kit.)

I found a pretty nice balance I think, its by a member of the community, y'all should check it out:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/FZ8HyaYf-poppy-my-visual-update-idea?page=1

She's already a far more cohesive character than old Sion was. They have no reason to erase such a defining characteristic of hers. They're going to make her look like a modern yordle in terms of anatomy, but her attitude should stick.

While I'm happy to know she is getting a visual update, I'm worried about her gameplay update. Honestly I haven't played her too much but I don't want some of her ult to be tossed away. It's a very unique and extremely useful ability that has decided many battles from entire teams focusing her while she has the retreating person ulted.

You can find out a bit more about the update via the [dev blog](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/dev-blog-champion-updates)!

I'm kind of enjoying being almost as good as a Red. I'm the first one on the scene, and I provide the right information. Although Katey, you did beat me with those links ;3

she is literally next in line for massive visual overhaul.

Her gameplay is also being updated, so kiss that no-counterplay ult good-bye.

I'm all for Poppy getting that kind of attention to detail but I'm afraid of it as well cause I think the new splash art for Tristana is terrible compared to the old one or the "intermediate update" version they had for a while. Yeah it matches the in-game look, which I'll admit is really good, but the splash art itself I think is very lackluster. Mostly from the distortion of the limbs and all. Kinda like how the new Ahri splash art makes no sense on the angel she's jumping from versus the way all her tails are moving. Weirdly enough, I just had a match that was Tristana adc with a Poppy support, and they were not bad together. Especially considering our opponents were Ezreal and Sona.

TLDR: I like that Poppy is getting an update if not a "yordlefacation".
